name: AWS SNS Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS SNS Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends data to AWS SNS

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends data to AWS SNS | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: publish
available_options: Publish (值: publish) - Publish a message to a topic

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: displayName (值: None) - The display name to use for a topic with SMS subscriptions
fifoTopic (值: None) - Whether the topic you want to create is a FIFO (first-in-first-out) topic

topic.name: topic
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

subject.name: subject
subject.description: Subject when the message is delivered to email endpoints
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Subject when the message is delivered to email endpoints | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.description: The message you want to send
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message you want to send | (必填项)
